TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITypeProvider

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

Docs.summary: Defines the behavior of a service that acts as a container of types.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](../../add/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
ITypeProvider can be pushed as a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> service to discover data types that are necessary for extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) workflow activation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Type GetType(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: A string that contains the name of the entity.
Docs.summary: Gets the <xref:System.Type> of the named entity.

MemberSignature.Value: public Type GetType (string name, bool throwOnError);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Type GetType(string name, bool throwOnError) cil managed

Docs.param: A string that contains the name of the entity.
A value that indicates whether to throw an exception if `name` is not resolvable.
Docs.summary: Gets the <xref:System.Type> of the named entity.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Type[] GetTypes() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates and returns an array which contains each <xref:System.Type> known to this instance.
Docs.returns: An array which contains each <xref:System.Type> known to this instance.
Docs.value: An array which contains each <xref:System.Type> known to this instance.

Docs.summary: Temporary assembly that is generated during the compilation process to validate the types in the active project that is being compiled.
Docs.value: The local <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> defined by this instance.
Docs.returns: The local <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly> defined by this instance.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of all assemblies referenced by the <xref:System.Type>.
Docs.value: A collection of all assemblies referenced by the <xref:System.Type>.
Docs.returns: A collection of all assemblies referenced by the <xref:System.Type>.

Docs.summary: Gets an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of load error exceptions keyed by the <xref:System.Object> causing the <xref:System.Exception>.
Docs.value: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of load error exceptions keyed by the <xref:System.Object> causing the <xref:System.Exception>.
Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of load error exceptions keyed by the <xref:System.Object> causing the <xref:System.Exception>.

Docs.summary: Occurs when the collection <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.TypeProvider.TypeLoadErrors%2A> is modified.
Occurs when the types in the type provider that implements this interface change. This can happen when an assembly or is added or removed from the type provider.
